change_summary.what_changed: Download options for the Windsurf Editor were updated to include specific options for macOS (Apple Silicon and Intel) and removed the Linux download option from the main pricing page
specific_changes: Added download options for macOS (Apple Silicon and Intel)
Removed Linux download option from the main pricing page

strategic_analysis.business_impact: The update may improve the user experience for macOS users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the overall business
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: The update suggests a focus on improving the user experience, but it is not a major strategic move
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The change is minor and may not affect the competitive landscape significantly

key_findings: The update improves download options for macOS users
opportunities: Improved user experience for macOS users
recommended_actions: Monitor user feedback on the updated download options

key_insights: The update improves download options for macOS users
